pages.text: Summons a creature's spirit from beyond and returns it to a fleshly body in this world. The creature summoned is determined by what items are placed on various $(l:apparatus/offering_plate)offering plates$() placed nearby ($(l:rituals/ritual_summon_creatures#multiblock)see layout$()).$(br2)$(warning) Unfortunately, due to limitations of this guide, a complete list of creatures and items can only be found in JEI.
Up to ten Offering Plates may be placed nearby (up to six blocks away).
